exceptions.exn: In environment n, m, p : N H1 : p * n >= p * m H2 : 0 < p Unable to unify "0 < p" with "p * m <= p * n".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall n m p : N, N.mul p n >= N.mul p m -> 0 < p -> n >= m

Premises:
Inductive N : Set := N0 : N | Npos : positive -> N Arguments Npos _%positive_scope
Nmult_ge_compat_l : forall n m p : N, n >= m -> p * n >= p * m
mult_ge_compat_l : forall n m p : nat, (n >= m)%nat -> (p * n >= p * m)%nat
Nge_ge_rev : forall n m : N, n >= m -> (N.to_nat n >= N.to_nat m)%nat
Nge_ge : forall n m : N, (N.to_nat n >= N.to_nat m)%nat -> n >= m
N.le_lt_trans : forall n m p : N, n <= m -> m < p -> n < p
N.lt_le_trans : forall n m p : N, n < m -> m <= p -> n < p
Nmult_lt_compat_l : forall n m p : N, n < m -> 0 < p -> p * n < p * m
N.ge_le : forall n m : N, n >= m -> m <= n
N.le_ge : forall n m : N, n <= m -> m >= n
Nmult_le_compat_rev_l : forall n m p : N, p * n <= p * m -> 0 < p -> n <= m
N.mul_lt_mono_nonneg : forall n m p q : N, 0 <= n -> n < m -> 0 <= p -> p < q -> n * p < m * q
ge_Nge : forall n m : nat, N.of_nat n >= N.of_nat m -> (n >= m)%nat
Nmult_reg_r : forall n m p : N, p <> 0 -> n * p = m * p -> n = m
N.mul_le_mono_nonneg_l : forall n m p : N, 0 <= p -> n <= m -> p * n <= p * m
N.mul_le_mono_nonneg_r : forall n m p : N, 0 <= p -> n <= m -> n * p <= m * p
Nmult_lt_compat_rev_l1 : forall n m p : N, p * n < p * m -> 0 < p
Nmult_lt_compat_rev_l2 : forall n m p : N, p * n < p * m -> n < m
N.mul_lt_mono_neg_l : forall p n m : N, p < 0 -> n < m < -> p * m < p * n
N.mul_lt_mono_pos_r : forall p n m : N, 0 < p -> n < m < -> n * p < m * p
N.mul_lt_mono_pos_l : forall p n m : N, 0 < p -> n < m < -> p * n < p * m
N.mul_lt_mono_neg_r : forall p n m : N, p < 0 -> n < m < -> m * p < n * p
N.add_lt_mono : forall n m p q : N, n < m -> p < q -> n + p < m + q
N.mul_le_mono_nonneg : forall n m p q : N, 0 <= n -> n <= m -> 0 <= p -> p <= q -> n * p <= m * q
N.le_lt_add_lt : forall n m p q : N, n <= m -> p + m < q + n -> p < q
N.mul_le_mono_neg_l : forall n m p : N, p < 0 -> n <= m < -> p * m <= p * n
N.mul_le_mono_pos_l : forall n m p : N, 0 < p -> n <= m < -> p * n <= p * m
N.mul_le_mono_neg_r : forall n m p : N, p < 0 -> n <= m < -> m * p <= n * p
N.mul_le_mono_pos_r : forall n m p : N, 0 < p -> n <= m < -> n * p <= m * p
N2Z.inj_ge : forall n m : N, n >= m < -> (Z.of_N n >= Z.of_N m)%Z
N.pow_neg_r : forall n p : N, p < 0 -> n ^ p = 0
N.pow_succ_r : forall n p : N, 0 <= p -> n ^ N.succ p = n * n ^ p
Nmult_gt_compat_rev_l1 : forall n m p : N, p * n > p * m -> p > 0
Nmult_gt_compat_rev_l2 : forall n m p : N, p * n > p * m -> n > m
N.mul_cancel_l : forall n m p : N, p <> 0 -> p * n = p * m < -> n = m
N.mul_cancel_r : forall n m p : N, p <> 0 -> n * p = m * p < -> n = m
N.add_le_mono : forall n m p q : N, n <= m -> p <= q -> n + p <= m + q
N.mul_lt_pred : forall p q n m : N, N.succ p = q -> p * n < p * m < -> q * n + m < q * m + n
N.ge_le_iff : forall n m : N, n >= m < -> m <= n
N.add_lt_mono_r : forall n m p : N, n < m < -> n + p < m + p
mult_lt_compat_l : forall n m p : nat, (n < m)%nat -> (0 < p)%nat -> (p * n < p * m)%nat

``` 
intros n m p H1 H2.
apply N.le_ge.
apply Nmult_le_compat_rev_l with (p := p).
exact H1.
exact H2.
